publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1962 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Suspension of Standing Ordersâ€”That the Parliament agrees that Rules 9.5.3B and 9.7.9 of the Standing Orders be suspended on Wednesday 6 June 2001 for the purposes of the Scottish Local Authorities (Tendering) Bill. Supported by: Euan Robson*
